entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 11 except plus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 11 except plus 4 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow near midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
